availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elizabeth Spencer Gambrill (Perry County, KY, spinner)

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, spinner. Kentucky native. Married to John Gambrill. Mother of Granville Gambrill, Delila Gambrill, Joseph Gambrill, Isabel Gambrill, William Gambrill, John Gambrill, Louisa Gambrill, and Jefferson Gambrill. Resident of Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Spinner in Perry County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 43B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, District 1, p. 718.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, Campbell, p. 551A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994052, Perry County Births, p. 1.
